member.name: D3D12_MEMCPY_DEST
member.summary: Describes the destination of a memory copy operation.

member.name: D3D12_MEMCPY_DEST.pData
member.summary: A pointer to a memory block that receives the copied data.

member.name: D3D12_MEMCPY_DEST.RowPitch
member.summary: The row pitch, or width, or physical size, in bytes, of the subresource data.

member.name: D3D12_MEMCPY_DEST.SlicePitch
member.summary: The slice pitch, or width, or physical size, in bytes, of the subresource data.
